issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.description:
{html}

Base UI => Views => Table View => Table View (Layout 4) (table_view_layout_4.js).

each row has a label object. when you click on the label object within a row, the selectedBackgroundImage does not activate, which seems to indicate that the click event is not getting through.

It works on other parts of the table view row

{html}
fields.summary: Row click does not propagate in table view
